title: Book the Life in the UK Test

details.description: Book a Life in the UK Test on the UK Border Agency website. You'll need to register for a Life in the UK account, choose a test centre, date and pay for the test
details.more_information:
Booking your test

You can buy the official Life in the UK handbook and study guides to help you prepare for your test.

To book a test you’ll need an email address.

The cost of the test is £50.

The earliest test you can take is 7 days from when you book your test.

You can also say if you have any special requests for taking the test - eg access requirements.

You can take the Life in the UK Test in Welsh or Scottish Gaelic languages in Wales or Scotland.

You must be able to show you can speak either English, Welsh or Scottish Gaelic to pass the test.

If you can’t speak English, instead of taking the Life in the UK Test you can take a course in English for speakers of other languages (ESOL) along with citizenship classes.
